title: Wikipedia Ingestion Import Schema
description: JSON schema for timeline ingestion output artifacts from Wikipedia strategy runners

run_id.description: Unique identifier for this ingestion run (typically timestamp in format YYYYMMDDTHHMMSSZ)

generated_at_utc.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the artifact was generated

event_count.description: Total number of events extracted in this run

metadata.description: Strategy-specific metadata about the ingestion run. Each strategy may provide different fields based on its implementation and data source characteristics. Common fields may include timing metrics, event counts, parsing statistics, and confidence distributions, but the exact structure is determined by the strategy.

title.description: Event title (typically first 50-70 characters of description)

start_year.description: Start year of the event (absolute value; BC dates are also positive integers)

end_year.description: End year of the event (for range events; same as start_year for point events)

is_bc_start.description: Whether the start year is BC (true) or AD (false)

is_bc_end.description: Whether the end year is BC (true) or AD (false)

start_month.description: Month of event start (1-12) or null if not specified

start_day.description: Day of event start (1-31) or null if not specified

end_month.description: Month of event end (1-12) or null if not specified

end_day.description: Day of event end (1-31) or null if not specified

precision.description: Precision factor for the date (0 = precise, higher values indicate less precise dates)

weight.description: Weight/importance metric for the event (related to date precision and span)

url.description: Source URL from which the event was extracted

span_match_notes.description: Parsing notes indicating the span/text that matched for date extraction

description.description: Full event description from the source

category.description: Category assigned to this event (e.g., 'Food History', 'Roman History')

_debug_extraction.description: Optional debug information about the extraction process
